title: Prologis Offers to Buy Duke Realty in Nearly $24 Billion Deal
sub_head: Duke is a REIT that specializes in industrial properties
body:
Prologis Inc. said it has made an offer to buy Duke Realty Corp. in an all-stock deal valuing Duke at $61.68 a share, or about $23.71 billion.
Shareholders of Duke Realty, a real-estate investment trust that specializes in industrial properties, would receive 0.466 shares of Prologis stock for each share of Duke Realty they own.
